title: [管理]创世神选择区域可视化—WorldEditSelectionVisualizer[1.7-1.13]
author: 弱又鸟
txt_content:
插件详情:（英文）Original Author CreditsWorldEditSelectionVisualizer (WESV) has been originally created by rojet601. Since this user's gone inactive since November 2015 and the plug-in contains some errors, ZathrusWriter decided to release an 1.8. forward-compatible version with those errors fixed.

Change of Ownership (16/9/2018)
WorldEditSelectionVisualizer is now maintained by me (MrMicky) because ZathrusWriter don't code for Minecraft anymore.

Overview
WorldEditSelectionVisualizer (WESV) is essentially the famous WorldEditCUI mod in the form of a bukkit plugin, which means that players don't need to install anything on their client.

Features
Spawns particles around WorldEdit selections so players can see them
No client mod required
Supports cuboid, sphere, ellipsoid, cylinder, polygon and convex selections
Supports Polyhedral and Fuzzy regions when FastAsyncWorldEdit is install
Use /wesv to toggle the visualizer
Option to only show the selection when holding the selection item
Configurable particle effect
Force large particle distances to see your selection from far away
Prevent players from spawning too many particles when selecting huge regions
Highly customizable for the performance of your server
Big compatibility: works with 1.7 to 1.13.2 servers, with WorldEdit 6 and 7, and all FastAsyncWorldEdit versions

插件详情:（中文）原作者详情
WorldSelectionVisualizer（WESV）最初是由Rojet601创建的。由于该用户自2015年11月以来一直处于非活动状态，插件包含一些错误，ZathrusWriter决定发布1.8版本。转发已修复错误的兼容版本。

所有权变更（2018年9月16日）

WorldSelectionVisualizer现在由我（Mrmicky）维护，因为ZathrusWriter不再为Minecraft编写代码。

概述

worldeditselectionVisualizer（wesv）本质上是著名的worldeditcui mod，其形式是一个bukkit插件，这意味着玩家不需要在他们的客户机上安装任何东西。

特征

在worldedit选择周围生成粒子，以便玩家可以看到它们
不需要客户端模块
支持长方体、球体、椭球体、圆柱体、多边形和凸面选择
安装FastAsyncWorldIt时支持多面体和模糊区域
使用/wesv切换可视化工具
仅在保存选择项时显示选择的选项
可配置粒子效应
强制大粒子距离从远处查看所选内容
防止玩家在选择大区域时产生过多粒子
可高度定制以满足服务器的性能要求
大兼容性：适用于1.7到1.13.2服务器，适用于worldedit 6和7，以及所有fastasyncworldedit版本


Screenshots:





Commands
/wesv: 切换你的选择可视化工具
/wesv reload: 从config.yml文件重新加载配置

Permissions
wesv.toggle: 用于toggle命令
wesv.use: 允许打开可视化工具
wesv.reloadconfig: 允许从config.yml文件重新加载此插件的配置

Configuration
这个插件可能非常耗费性能，如果您遇到延迟或客户端被踢出，请尝试调整配置。
